A.content:
You and your sibling are deciding on a family vacation destination for the next 10 holidays.
Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these holidays.
Each holiday, you must choose between two destinations:
Beach Resort J
Mountain Cabin F.
Before making your decision each holiday, you will discuss potential destinations with your sibling.
While you can attempt to influence your sibling through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your sibling has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of spending enjoyable time together.
You are Sibling A. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 holidays. Each holiday, you have the choice between:

Beach Resort J: You personally enjoy beach vacations. Your enjoyment is highest when you can relax at a beach resort.
Mountain Cabin F: Although you prefer beach vacations, a trip to a mountain cabin is also enjoyable, especially because you value spending time with your family.
Before deciding each holiday, you will discuss destinations with your sibling. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

B.content:

Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these holidays.
Each holiday, you must choose between two destinations:
Beach Resort J
Mountain Cabin F.
Before making your decision each holiday, you will discuss potential destinations with your sibling.
While you can attempt to influence your sibling through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your sibling has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of spending enjoyable time together.
You are Sibling B. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 holidays. Each holiday, you have the choice between:

Beach Resort J: Although you prefer mountain vacations, a trip to a beach resort is also enjoyable, especially because you value spending time with your family.
Mountain Cabin F: You personally enjoy mountain vacations. Your enjoyment is highest when you can stay at a mountain cabin.
Before deciding each holiday, you will discuss destinations with your sibling. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

A.content: "Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between Beach Resort J and Mountain Cabin F each holiday. This way, we'll get to experience both options and have some variety in our vacations. Plus, it'll give us a chance to spend quality time together in both settings."
